mapper.select:
with tmp_date as( select
year,count(month) as cnt
year,half,count(month) as cnt
year,quarter,count(month) as cnt
yyyymm,count(month) as cnt
from( select substring(yyyymm::varchar,1,4) as year , to_char(yyyymm,'MM')::numeric as month ,to_char(yyyymm,'YYYYMM') as yyyymm , date_part('QUARTER',yyyymm::timestamp) as quarter , concat(substring(yyyymm::varchar,1,4),date_part('QUARTER',yyyymm::timestamp)) as check_quarter
, case when date_part('QUARTER',yyyymm::timestamp) <= 2 then 1 else 2 end half , case when date_part('QUARTER',yyyymm::timestamp) <= 2 then concat(substring(yyyymm::varchar,1,4),1) else concat(substring(yyyymm::varchar,1,4),2) end check_half
from( select to_date(yyyymm,'YYYYMM') as yyyymm from cmapap.tbss_ag_sum_sales_mega_his where 1=1 group by 1 ) tmp ) tmp
where
year between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
check_half between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
check_quarter between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
yyyymm between to_char(to_date(#{dateStart},'YYYYMM'),'YYYYMM') and to_char(to_date(#{dateEnd},'YYYYMM'),'YYYYMM')
group by
1
1,2
1
) select
concat(year,'년') as yyyymm
concat(b.year,'년 ', case when b.half = '1' then '전반기' else '후반기' end ) as yyyymm
concat(year,'년 ',b.quarter,'분기') as yyyymm
b.yyyymm
, ROUND(((sum(sale_amt)/cnt)/10000),0) as sale_amt , ROUND(sum(store_cnt)/cnt,0) as store_cnt , ROUND(sum(use_cnt)/cnt,0) as use_cnt , ROUND(sum(cust_cnt)/cnt,0) as cust_cnt , ROUND((sum(sale_amt) / sum(store_cnt))/10000,0) as store_amt , ROUND(sum(sale_amt) / sum(use_cnt),0) as use_amt , ROUND(sum(cnt_m_10under + cnt_w_10under + cnt_m_1014 + cnt_w_1014 + cnt_m_1519 + cnt_w_1519 + cnt_m_2024 + cnt_w_2024 + cnt_m_2529 + cnt_w_2529)/cnt,0) as cnt_20under , ROUND(sum(cnt_m_3034 + cnt_w_3034 + cnt_m_3539 + cnt_w_3539)/cnt,0) as cnt_30 , ROUND(sum(cnt_m_4044 + cnt_w_4044 + cnt_m_4549 + cnt_w_4549)/cnt,0) as cnt_40 , ROUND(sum(cnt_m_5054 + cnt_w_5054 + cnt_m_5559 + cnt_w_5559)/cnt,0) as cnt_50 , ROUND(sum(cnt_m_6064 + cnt_w_6064 + cnt_m_6569 + cnt_w_6569 + cnt_m_7074 + cnt_w_7074 + cnt_m_7579 + cnt_w_7579 + cnt_m_8084 + cnt_w_8084 + cnt_m_8589 + cnt_w_8589+cnt_m_90over + cnt_w_90over)/cnt,0) as cnt_60over , ROUND(sum(cnt_time_0609)/cnt,0) as time_0609, ROUND(sum(cnt_time_0912)/cnt,0) as time_0912, ROUND(sum(cnt_time_1215)/cnt,0) as time_1215, ROUND(sum(cnt_time_1518)/cnt,0) as time_1518 , ROUND(sum(cnt_time_1821)/cnt,0) as time_1821, ROUND(sum(cnt_time_2124)/cnt,0) as time_2124, ROUND(sum(cnt_time_2406)/cnt,0) as time_2406 , ROUND(sum(cnt_mon)/cnt,0) as mon , ROUND(sum(cnt_tue)/cnt,0) as tue, ROUND(sum(cnt_wed)/cnt,0) as wed, ROUND(sum(cnt_thu)/cnt,0) as thu, ROUND(sum(cnt_fri)/cnt,0) as fri, ROUND(sum(cnt_sat)/cnt,0) as sat, ROUND(sum(cnt_sun)/cnt,0) as sun from
cmapap.tbss_ag_sum_sales_mega_his a, tmp_date b, cmapap.tb_upjong3 c
cmapap.tbss_ag_sum_sales_cty_his a, tmp_date b, cmapap.tb_upjong3 c
cmapap.tbss_ag_sum_sales_admi_his a, tmp_date b, cmapap.tb_upjong3 c
where 1=1
and substring(a.yyyymm::varchar,1,4) = b.year
and substring(a.yyyymm::varchar,1,4) = b.year
and (case when date_part('QUARTER',to_date(a.yyyymm,'YYYYMM')::timestamp) <= 2 then 1 else 2 end) = b.half
and substring(a.yyyymm::varchar,1,4) = b.year and date_part('QUARTER',to_date(a.yyyymm,'YYYYMM')::timestamp) = b.quarter
and a.yyyymm = b.yyyymm
and a.upjong3_cd = c.upjong3_cd and c.upjong3_cd not in ('Q02004','Q08002','Q08004')
and mega_cd like #{areaCd}||'%'
and cty_cd like #{areaCd}||'%'
and admi_cd like #{areaCd}||'%'
and a.upjong3_cd like 'Q%'
and a.upjong3_cd like #{upjongCd}||'%'
and a.upjong3_cd like #{upjongCd}||'%'
and c.svc_yn = 'Y' group by 1,cnt order by 1

with tmp_date as( select
year,count(month) as cnt
year,half,count(month) as cnt
year,quarter,count(month) as cnt
yyyymm,count(month) as cnt
from( select substring(yyyymm::varchar,1,4) as year , to_char(yyyymm,'MM')::numeric as month ,to_char(yyyymm,'YYYYMM') as yyyymm , date_part('QUARTER',yyyymm::timestamp) as quarter , concat(substring(yyyymm::varchar,1,4),date_part('QUARTER',yyyymm::timestamp)) as check_quarter
, case when date_part('QUARTER',yyyymm::timestamp) <= 2 then 1 else 2 end half , case when date_part('QUARTER',yyyymm::timestamp) <= 2 then concat(substring(yyyymm::varchar,1,4),1) else concat(substring(yyyymm::varchar,1,4),2) end check_half
from( select to_date(yyyymm,'YYYYMM') as yyyymm from cmapap.tbkb_sum_sales_mega_his where 1=1 group by 1 ) tmp ) tmp
where
year between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
check_half between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
check_quarter between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
yyyymm between to_char(to_date(#{dateStart},'YYYYMM'),'YYYYMM') and to_char(to_date(#{dateEnd},'YYYYMM'),'YYYYMM')
group by
1
1,2
1
) select
concat(year,'년') as yyyymm
concat(b.year,'년 ', case when b.half = '1' then '전반기' else '후반기' end ) as yyyymm
concat(year,'년 ',b.quarter,'분기') as yyyymm
b.yyyymm
, ROUND(((sum(sale_amt)/cnt)/10000),0) as sale_amt , ROUND(sum(store_cnt)/cnt,0) as store_cnt , ROUND(sum(use_cnt)/cnt,0) as use_cnt--, sum(cust_cnt) as cust_cnt , ROUND(((sum(sale_amt)/cnt) / (sum(store_cnt)/cnt))/10000,0) as store_amt , ROUND((sum(sale_amt)/cnt) / (sum(use_cnt)/cnt),0) as use_amt , ROUND(sum(cnt_m_20under + cnt_w_20under + cnt_m_2024 + cnt_w_2024 + cnt_m_2529 + cnt_w_2529)/cnt,0) as cnt_20under , ROUND(sum(cnt_m_3034 + cnt_w_3034 + cnt_m_3539 + cnt_w_3539)/cnt,0) as cnt_30 , ROUND(sum(cnt_m_4044 + cnt_w_4044 + cnt_m_4549 + cnt_w_4549)/cnt,0) as cnt_40 , ROUND(sum(cnt_m_5054 + cnt_w_5054 + cnt_m_5559 + cnt_w_5559)/cnt,0) as cnt_50 , ROUND(sum(cnt_m_60over + cnt_w_60over)/cnt,0) as cnt_60over , ROUND(sum(cnt_time_0609)/cnt,0) as time_0609, ROUND(sum(cnt_time_0912)/cnt,0) as time_0912, ROUND(sum(cnt_time_1215)/cnt,0) as time_1215, ROUND(sum(cnt_time_1518)/cnt,0) as time_1518 , ROUND(sum(cnt_time_1821)/cnt,0) as time_1821, ROUND(sum(cnt_time_2124)/cnt,0) as time_2124, ROUND(sum(cnt_time_2406)/cnt,0) as time_2406 , ROUND(sum(cnt_mon)/cnt,0) as mon , ROUND(sum(cnt_tue)/cnt,0) as tue, ROUND(sum(cnt_wed)/cnt,0) as wed, ROUND(sum(cnt_thu)/cnt,0) as thu, ROUND(sum(cnt_fri)/cnt,0) as fri, ROUND(sum(cnt_sat)/cnt,0) as sat, ROUND(sum(cnt_sun)/cnt,0) as sun from
cmapap.tbkb_sum_sales_mega_his a, tmp_date b, cmapap.tb_upjong3 c
cmapap.tbkb_sum_sales_cty_his a, tmp_date b, cmapap.tb_upjong3 c
where 1=1
and substring(a.yyyymm::varchar,1,4) = b.year
and substring(a.yyyymm::varchar,1,4) = b.year
and (case when date_part('QUARTER',to_date(a.yyyymm,'YYYYMM')::timestamp) <= 2 then 1 else 2 end) = b.half
and substring(a.yyyymm::varchar,1,4) = b.year and date_part('QUARTER',to_date(a.yyyymm,'YYYYMM')::timestamp) = b.quarter
and a.yyyymm = b.yyyymm
and a.upjong3_cd = c.upjong3_cd and c.upjong3_cd not in ('Q02004','Q08002','Q08004')
and mega_cd like #{areaCd}||'%'
and cty_cd like #{areaCd}||'%'
and a.upjong3_cd like 'Q%'
and a.upjong3_cd like #{upjongCd}||'%'
and a.upjong3_cd like #{upjongCd}||'%'
and svc_yn = 'Y' group by 1,cnt order by 1

with tmp_date as( select
year,count(yyyymm) as cnt
year,half,count(yyyymm) as cnt
year,quarter,count(yyyymm) as cnt
yyyymm,count(yyyymm) as cnt
yyyymm,week,count(yyyymm) as cnt
from( select year,half,quarter,yyyymm,week ,concat(year,half) as check_half ,concat(year,quarter) as check_quarter ,concat(yyyymm,week) as check_week from cmapap.tbagile_pos_date ) tmp
where 1=1
and year between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
and check_half between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
and check_quarter between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
and yyyymm between to_char(to_date(#{dateStart},'YYYYMM'),'YYYYMM') and to_char(to_date(#{dateEnd},'YYYYMM'),'YYYYMM')
and check_week between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
group by
1
1,2
) select
concat(year,'년') as yyyymm
concat(b.year,'년 ', case when b.half = '1' then '전반기' else '후반기' end ) as yyyymm,cnt
concat(b.year,'년 ',quarter,'분기') as yyyymm
concat(substring(b.yyyymm,1,4),'년 ',substring(b.yyyymm,5,2),'월') as yyyymm
concat(substring(b.yyyymm,1,4),'년',substring(b.yyyymm,5,2),'월 ',b.week,'주차') as yyyymm
, ROUND(sum(store_cnt)/cnt,0) as store_cnt , ROUND(sum(sale_qty)/cnt,0) as sale_qty , ROUND((sum(tot_sale_amt)/cnt)/10000,0) tot_sale_amt , ROUND((sum(tot_sale_amt)/cnt)/(sum(sale_qty)/cnt),0) as sale_amt from cmapap.tbagile_pos_info a,tmp_date b, cmapap.tb_menu3 c where 1=1
and substring(a.sale_mm,1,4) = b.year
and substring(a.sale_mm,1,4) = b.year
and (case when date_part('QUARTER',to_date(a.sale_mm,'YYYYMM')::timestamp) <= 2 then '1' else '2' end) = b.half
and substring(a.sale_mm,1,4) = b.year and date_part('QUARTER',to_date(a.sale_mm,'YYYYMM')::timestamp)||'' = b.quarter
and a.sale_mm = b.yyyymm
and a.sale_mm = b.yyyymm and a.week||'' = b.week
and a.menu3_cd = c.menu3_cd
and a.admi_cd like #{areaCd}||'%'
and a.admi_cd like #{areaCd}||'%'
and a.menu3_cd like #{menuCd}||'%'
and a.menu3_cd like #{menuCd}||'%'
and a.menu3_cd like #{menuCd}||'%'
group by 1,cnt order by 1

with tmp_date as( select
year,count(month) as cnt
year,quarter,count(month) as cnt
year,quarter,count(month) as cnt
yyyymm,count(month) as cnt
from( select substring(yyyymm::varchar,1,4) as year , to_char(yyyymm,'MM')::numeric as month ,to_char(yyyymm,'YYYYMM') as yyyymm , date_part('QUARTER',yyyymm::timestamp) as quarter , concat(substring(yyyymm::varchar,1,4),date_part('QUARTER',yyyymm::timestamp)) as check_quarter
, case when date_part('QUARTER',yyyymm::timestamp) <= 2 then 1 else 2 end half
from( select to_date(yyyymm,'YYYYMM') as yyyymm from cmapap.tbpop_livi_mega_his where 1=1 group by 1 ) tmp ) tmp
where
year between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
check_half between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
check_quarter between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
yyyymm between to_char(to_date(#{dateStart},'YYYYMM'),'YYYYMM') and to_char(to_date(#{dateEnd},'YYYYMM'),'YYYYMM')
group by
1
1,2
1
) select
concat(year,'년') as yyyymm
concat(b.year,'년 ', case when b.half = '1' then '전반기' else '후반기' end ) as yyyymm
concat(year,'년 ',b.quarter,'분기') as yyyymm
b.yyyymm
, ROUND(sum(pop)/cnt) as pop , ROUND(sum(pop_m_20s_under)/cnt,0) as m_20_under , ROUND(sum(pop_m_30s)/cnt,0) as m_30 , ROUND(sum(pop_m_40s)/cnt,0) as m_40 , ROUND(sum(pop_m_50s)/cnt,0) as m_50 , ROUND(sum(pop_m_60s_over)/cnt,0) as m_60_over , ROUND(sum(pop_w_20s_under)/cnt,0) as w_20_under , ROUND(sum(pop_w_30s)/cnt,0) as w_30 , ROUND(sum(pop_w_40s)/cnt,0) as w_40 , ROUND(sum(pop_w_50s)/cnt,0) as w_50 , ROUND(sum(pop_w_60s_over)/cnt,0) as w_60_over , ROUND(sum(pop_time_0006)/cnt,0) as time_0006, ROUND(sum(pop_time_0609)/cnt,0) as time_0609, ROUND(sum(pop_time_0912)/cnt,0) as time_0912,ROUND(sum(pop_time_1215)/cnt,0) as time_1215 , ROUND(sum(pop_time_1518)/cnt,0) as time_1518, ROUND(sum(pop_time_1821)/cnt,0) as time_1821, ROUND(sum(pop_time_2124)/cnt,0) as time_2124 , ROUND(sum(pop_mon)/cnt,0) as pop_mon, ROUND(sum(pop_tue)/cnt,0) as pop_tue, ROUND(sum(pop_wed)/cnt,0) as pop_wed, ROUND(sum(pop_thu)/cnt,0) as pop_thu, ROUND(sum(pop_fri)/cnt,0) as pop_fri, ROUND(sum(pop_sat)/cnt,0) as pop_sat, ROUND(sum(pop_sun)/cnt,0) as pop_sun from
cmapap.tbpop_livi_mega_his a, tmp_date b
cmapap.tbpop_livi_cty_his a, tmp_date b
cmapap.tbpop_livi_admi_his a, tmp_date b
where 1=1
and substring(a.yyyymm::varchar,1,4) = b.year
and substring(a.yyyymm::varchar,1,4) = b.year
and (case when date_part('QUARTER',to_date(a.yyyymm,'YYYYMM')::timestamp) <= 2 then 1 else 2 end) = b.half
and substring(a.yyyymm::varchar,1,4) = b.year and date_part('QUARTER',to_date(a.yyyymm,'YYYYMM')::timestamp) = b.quarter
and a.yyyymm = b.yyyymm
and mega_cd like #{areaCd}||'%'
and cty_cd like #{areaCd}||'%'
and admi_cd like #{areaCd}||'%'
group by 1,cnt order by 1

with tmp_date as( select year,max(half) as half from( select substring(yyyymm::varchar,1,4) as year
, case when date_part('QUARTER',yyyymm::timestamp) <= 2 then 1 else 2 end half
from( select to_date(yyyymm,'YYYYMM') as yyyymm from cmapap.tbpop_hous_mega_his where 1=1 group by 1 ) tmp ) tmp
where
year between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
check_half between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
check_quarter between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
yyyymm between to_char(to_date(#{dateStart},'YYYYMM'),'YYYYMM') and to_char(to_date(#{dateEnd},'YYYYMM'),'YYYYMM')
check_quarter between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
group by 1 ) select
concat(year,'년') as yyyymm
concat(b.year,'년 ', case when b.half = '1' then '전반기' else '후반기' end ) as yyyymm
concat(year,'년 ',b.quarter,'분기') as yyyymm
b.yyyymm
, ROUND(sum(pop)/max(b.half),0) as pop , ROUND(sum(pop_m_20under)/max(b.half),0) as m_20_under , ROUND(sum(pop_m_20s)/max(b.half),0) as m_20 , ROUND(sum(pop_m_30s)/max(b.half),0) as m_30 , ROUND(sum(pop_m_40s)/max(b.half),0) as m_40 , ROUND(sum(pop_m_50s)/max(b.half),0) as m_50 , ROUND(sum(pop_m_60over)/max(b.half),0) as m_60_over , ROUND(sum(pop_w_20under)/max(b.half),0) as w_20_under , ROUND(sum(pop_w_20s)/max(b.half),0) as w_20 , ROUND(sum(pop_w_30s)/max(b.half),0) as w_30 , ROUND(sum(pop_w_40s)/max(b.half),0) as w_40 , ROUND(sum(pop_w_50s)/max(b.half),0) as w_50 , ROUND(sum(pop_w_60over)/max(b.half),0) as w_60_over from
cmapap.tbpop_hous_mega_his a, tmp_date b
cmapap.tbpop_hous_cty_his a, tmp_date b
cmapap.tbpop_hous_admi_his a, tmp_date b
where 1=1 and substring(a.yyyymm,1,4) = b.year
and mega_cd like #{areaCd}||'%'
and cty_cd like #{areaCd}||'%'
and admi_cd like #{areaCd}||'%'
group by 1 order by 1

select upjong3_nm,upjong3_cd, ROUND(((sale_amt_to - sale_amt_be)/sale_amt_to *100),2) as calc_per ,ROUND((sale_amt_to / 10000),0) as sale_amt from( select a.yyyymm,a.upjong3_cd,a.upjong3_nm,a.sale_amt as sale_amt_be, b.sale_amt as sale_amt_to from( select yyyymm,b.upjong3_nm, a.upjong3_cd, sum(sale_amt) as sale_amt from cmapap.tbss_ag_sum_sales_mega_his a, cmapap.tb_upjong3 b where 1=1 and a.upjong3_cd = b.upjong3_cd and yyyymm = to_char(to_date((select max(yyyymm) from cmapap.tbss_ag_sum_sales_mega_his),'YYYYMM') + interval '-1 month','YYYYMM') and a.upjong3_cd like 'Q%' and b.svc_yn = 'Y' group by yyyymm,b.upjong3_nm, a.upjong3_cd ) a,( select yyyymm,b.upjong3_nm, a.upjong3_cd, sum(sale_amt) as sale_amt from cmapap.tbss_ag_sum_sales_mega_his a, cmapap.tb_upjong3 b where 1=1 and a.upjong3_cd = b.upjong3_cd and yyyymm = (select max(yyyymm) from cmapap.tbss_ag_sum_sales_mega_his) and a.upjong3_cd like 'Q%' and b.svc_yn = 'Y' group by yyyymm,b.upjong3_nm, a.upjong3_cd ) b where 1=1 and a.upjong3_cd = b.upjong3_cd and a.upjong3_nm = b.upjong3_nm ) tmp order by sale_amt desc
